inputs.remark:
Ordered list: Textbook does not specify a formal ordered list; recommend starting with tympanometry, followed by PTA.
Timeline: Expected outcome should belong to V3.

logic_summary: Reordered ordered_list to start with Tympanometry followed by Pure-tone audiometry as recommended.
Added Visit V3 to expected_interpretations_by_visit to capture the expected outcome details.

value.rationale_short: Evaluate middle ear function to investigate the conductive component.
Assess speech reception thresholds and word recognition abilities.
Assess integrity of the reflex arc and cross-check middle ear status.
Assess cochlear outer hair cell function; presence contradicts conductive loss.
Retest with insert earphones to rule out collapsing ear canals.

value.action: Real Ear Probe Tube Microphone Measurement
value.rationale_short: Measure ear canal resonance in collapsed vs. stented states.

value.collective_interpretation: Patient reported ability to carry on normal activities and hear most people, even in many adverse listening environments. Measured Speech Intelligibility Index (SII) improved from 40% (collapsed state) to 100% (with Lucite stent).
